actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for operation in the coastwise trade for the vessel MAYA.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating, notwithstanding specified provisions, to issue a certificate of documentation with a coastwise endorsement for the vessel MAYA (United States official number 1107319).

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for operation in the coastwise trade for the vessel MAYA.
To authorize the Secretary of the Department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for operation in the coastwise trade for the vessel MAYA.
